How do I install a Linux distribution on my system in order to mine Verus?

To install a Linux distribution on your system for mining Verus, you can use the `proot-distro` package. First, install `proot-distro` by running the command `pkg install proot-distro`. Then, you can install a supported Linux distribution, such as Ubuntu 20.04, by running the command `proot-distro install ubuntu-20.04`. After installation, you can log in to the distribution by running `proot-distro login ubuntu-20.04`.
